attributes.action: bring back the Long Service Increment (LSI) for all fire and rescue personel with 15 or more years service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it was wrong to take it - bring it back now!!!
Reward experience - like all other services do

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bring back the Long Service Increment (LSI) for all fire and rescue personel with 15 or more years service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10807.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/fireserviceLSI/
